segments.text: Well , humans could never make something like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Those poor Egyptians slaves worked so hard and you want to give aliens all the credit !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Be a little more open-minded , Stu ! Don't believe everything you read in your history books !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , but don't believe everything you see on The X-files , either !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Speaking of The X-files , it's on right now !
segments.speaker: S1
